name: OMSI Human Configuration File
summary: File created by OMSI The Bus Simulator, a bus driving simulation program; contains configuration data for humans that appear during gameplay, such as bus passenger and pedestrian movement; can be customized; similar to other OMSI configuration files like .SCO , .SLI , .BUS , and .OVH files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: MR Software OMSI The Bus Simulator 2
